member.name: SHELLSTATE
member.summary: Contains settings for the Shell's state. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowAllObjects
member.summary: TRUE to show all objects, including hidden files and folders. FALSE to hide hidden files and folders.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowExtensions
member.summary: TRUE to show file name extensions, FALSE to hide them.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fNoConfirmRecycle
member.summary: TRUE to show no confirmation dialog box when deleting items to the Recycle Bin, FALSE to display the confirmation dialog box.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowSysFiles
member.summary: TRUE to show system files, FALSE to hide them.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowCompColor
member.summary: TRUE to show encrypted or compressed NTFS files in color.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fDoubleClickInWebView
member.summary: TRUE to require a double-click to open an item when in web view.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fDesktopHTML
member.summary: TRUE to use Active Desktop, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fWin95Classic
member.summary: TRUE to enforce Windows 95 Shell behavior and restrictions.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fDontPrettyPath
member.summary: TRUE to prevent the conversion of the path to all lowercase characters.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowAttribCol
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fMapNetDrvBtn
member.summary: TRUE to display a Map Network Drive button.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowInfoTip
member.summary: TRUE to show a pop-up description for folders and files.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fHideIcons
member.summary: TRUE to hide desktop icons, FALSE to show them.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fWebView
member.summary: TRUE to display as a web view.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fFilter
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowSuperHidden
member.summary: TRUE to show operating system files.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fNoNetCrawling
member.summary: TRUE to disable automatic searching for network folders and printers.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.dwWin95Unused
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.uWin95Unused
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.lParamSort
member.summary: The column to sort by.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.iSortDirection
member.summary: Alphabetical sort direction for the column specified by lParamSort. Use 1 for an ascending sort, -1 for a descending sort.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.version
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.uNotUsed
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fSepProcess
member.summary: TRUE to launch folder windows in separate processes, FALSE to launch in the same process.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fStartPanelOn
member.summary: Windows XP only. TRUE to use the Windows XP-style Start menu, FALSE to use the classic Start menu.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowStartPage
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fAutoCheckSelect
member.summary: Introduced in Windows Vista. TRUE to use the Windows Vista-style checkbox folder views, FALSE to use the classic views.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fIconsOnly
member.summary: Introduced in Windows Vista. TRUE to show generic icons only, FALSE to show thumbnail-style icons in folders.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowTypeOverlay
member.summary: Introduced in Windows Vista. TRUE indicates a thumbnail should show the application that would be invoked when opening the item, FALSE indicates that no application will be shown.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fShowStatusBar
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8. TRUE to show the status bar; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: SHELLSTATE.fSpareFlags
member.summary: Not used.
